quote: After that Jehovah said to Noah: â€œGo into the ark, you and all your household, because you are the one I have found to be righteous before me among this generation.

On the day that Moses finished setting up the tabernacle, he anointed it and sanctified it, together with all its furnishings, the altar, and all its utensils. When he had anointed and sanctified these things,
